feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 11:52PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED SURF FROM POINT HOPE TO THE BERING STRAIT THROUGH MONDAY... Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph are expected through Monday along the coast south of Point Hope to the Bering Strait, causing elevated surf with minor beach erosion for north facing coastlines.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...TROPICAL FUNNEL CLOUDS POSSIBLE TODAY... Lines of numerous showers and thunderstorms will train over the Lower Texas Coast this afternoon and evening. The atmosphere will be conducive for the quick development of tropical funnel clouds as bands of convection sweep over the area. Any funnel clouds should be short lived and should not reach the ground, however,
